addition.item: The language of the quotations can be selected from various options: the front-end language, all languages or a specific language.
Source code and issues are now public on GitHub github.com/muhme/quote_joomla.
There is a demo site created with joomla.zitat-service.de.
There is help page created with github.com/muhme/quote_joomla/wiki in five languages.

change.item: The module is now using the new API api.zitat-service.de, which is supporting five languages and using unique identifieres instead of names.
In the backend, you can select the author, category or user directly from a list of possible entries.

note.item: After updating the plugin to a version from 2.0.0, a saved author, category and user parameter MUST be reselected once, in order to switch to the unique IDs.
